title: How to solve Knapsack problem using Dynamic Programming

title: How to find Nth Number in Catalan Numbers?

title: How to Find Longest Common Subsequence ?
content: The longest common subsequence (LCS) problem is the problem of finding the longest subsequence common to all sequences in a set of sequences (often just two sequences).
